# Data Exploration

```{r}
zillow.data <- read.csv('../Data/zillow.csv')
print(str(zillow.data))
```

```{r}
summary(zillow.data)
```

# Data Cleaning

```{r}
zillow.data<-subset (zillow.data, select = -c(real.estate.provider:relaxed))
zillow.data<-subset (zillow.data, select = -c(currency,commute))

```

# Data Exploration V2

```{r, fig.height= 5, fig.width= 6}
pairs(~area+bathrooms+bedrooms+homeStatus+homeType+price+state, data = zillow.data)
```

```{r}
hist(zillow.data$bedrooms,
     main = 'Histogram of bedroom',
     xlab = 'bedroom')
```

```{r}
hist(zillow.data$bathrooms,
     main = 'Histogram of bathroom',
     xlab = 'bathroom')
```

```{r}
hist(zillow.data$area,
     main = 'Histogram of area',
     xlab = 'area')
```
